title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When attempting to perform a 'copy package' operation in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui plugin within the jdt.ui3 package, selecting 'xxx' as the destination results in unexpected behavior.
OB: The plugin org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui should be used instead of 'xxx' as the destination package.
EB: The package 'xxx' should be replaced with 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination package.
SR: Update the 'copy package' operation to use 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination package to ensure the expected behavior.
